sentences.sentence: Massive rubbish dumps and sprawling landfills constitute one of the more uncomfortable impacts that humans have on wildlife.
sentences.translation: 巨大的垃圾堆和杂乱无章的垃圾填埋场，是人类对野生动物造成的最不适的影响之一。
我绊了一下，摔了个四脚朝天。

sentences.sentence: Something hit her and sent her sprawling to the ground.
sentences.translation: 不知什么东西击中了她，把她打趴在地上。
